subject: Order #SSN2901
description_text:
Good afternoon. I would like to know when my package will be shipped. I
ordered it on October 10, 2025. #SSN2901

conversations.body_text: Hello, your parcel has been dispatched via DHL Express. Here is your tracking link:  https://www.dhl.com/us-en/home/tracking.html?tracking-id=CE326628198DE
